title: Imperial Security Bureau Agent
responsibilities: Check for Imperial approved communications only among civilians
Log exceptions for troopers to follow up on
Keep an eye out for rebel communications

title: Battle Station Operations Staff
location: DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station
responsibilities: Manage day to day operations among the DS-1 Battle Station
Submit to a 10 year term among the DS-1
Prepare the DS-1 for planetary annihilation at a moment's notice
Applicants must be ready to defend the station should it be necessary

title: Imperial Special Forces
responsibilities: Redacted

title: Storm Trooper
responsibilities: Follow orders.

title: Barista
responsibilities: Brew fresh coffee daily, using only the darkest beans
Serve coffee the way the dark side intended - black
No smiling, but no frowning either, remember Empirebucks is meant to be a relaxing place to enjoy your sanctioned 10 minute break, just make sure you're not enjoying your break too much.

title: Teller
responsibilities: Process deposits daily
Take in customer complaints, log the ID of the complainers, then destroy them
Identify personnel who have saved more than the recommended allowance, transfer their funds to the Empire.

title: Commissary Server
responsibilities: Order intake, Imperial and otherwise
Superior time management - there are a lot of hungry troopers out there! Despite the fact this is space, everyone takes lunch at the same time
Daily cleaning of the Play Place

title: Commissary Server
responsibilities: Order intake, Imperial and otherwise
Actually, the Droids do most of the work, you just need to stay out of their way
Insert as many demeaning jabs as possible towards Empire Bucks when conversing with customers
Regular coffee runs to Sith meetings
Droid polishing
